snippet: Unlike most government officials, football coaches at schools like U.T.-Austin are celebrated and showered with riches, until they’re not.
lead_paragraph: Unlike most government officials, football coaches at schools like U.T.-Austin are celebrated and showered with riches, until they’re not.

headline.seo: If State Government Were Scrutinized Like a Sport
headline.main: If Lawmakers Were Treated Like Coaches
headline.print_headline: If Lawmakers Were Treated Like Coaches
